mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEMBERNUM, EMAIL, PW, NAME, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, ADDRESS3, RRNF, RRNL, JOINDATE, MEMBERSTATE, ADMINCHECK, TEL, OWNCHECK) VALUES(#{memberNum}, #{email}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{rrnf}, #{rrnl}, now(), 1, 1, #{tel}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET EMAIL=#{email}, PW=#{pw}, MEMBERSTATE=1 WHERE MEMBERNUM=#{memberNum}
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE NAME = #{name} AND TEL = #{tel}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE NAME = #{name} AND EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PW =#{pw} WHERE NAME = #{name} AND EMAIL = #{email}
UPDATE MEMBER SET PW=#{pw} WHERE EMAIL=#{email}
